snippet: Klay Thompson scored 34 points, leading Golden State to its first win in San Antonio since 1997.
abstract: Golden State Warriors defeat San Antonio Spurs, 100-91, to tie Western Conference semifinals, 1-1; other NBA developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Klay Thompson scored 34 points, leading Golden State to its first win in San Antonio since 1997.

headline.seo: Warriors Beat Spurs to Tie Series
headline.main: Warriors Beat Spurs to Tie Series
headline.print_headline: Warriors Beat Spurs to Tie Series
